HDG.BC.content: [almost Freudian] unrest as the surge of mere life revealing itself, to remain thrust/forced into its own craving belongs to essence of living [conatus] > man over animal can elevate living/craving into guiding measure, make it the “principle” of “progress” [Kant]

HDG.BC.content: does most said in saying keep its essence secret? [why name Being?], Being keeps its essence silent, as silence, origin of language > the animal doesn’t speak: silence is impossible for it > language stands in essential relation to uniqueness of Being [Being needs man]

HDG.BC.content: long acquaintance w/ man, no guarantee man is in right position to ask who he is—not to mention find answer that would possess sustaining power to bring essence of man to fulfillment in historical humanity
HDG.BC.linkedContent: long acquaintance w/ man, no guarantee man is in right position to ask who he is—not to mention find answer that would possess sustaining power to bring essence of man to fulfillment in historical humanity

HDG.BC.content: one can capture “lived experiences” in reports > essence of man securely delimited: man is the presencing animal (animal rationale) [?] > balance btwn “calculability” of life & drunkenness of lived experience > anthropology, Americans seek determination of what man is, how he can be most efficiently/effectively used (am wirksamsten zu gebrauchen sei) , in most appropriate place, w/out loss of time or energy [Marx-like]

HDG.MA.content: so firmly shackled to technical devices, fall in bondage to them > we can affirm unavoidable use of technical devices, also deny them right to dominate us [prosthetic usage?]
HDG.MA.linkedContent: so firmly shackled to technical devices, fall in bondage to them > we can affirm unavoidable use of technical devices, also deny them right to dominate us [prosthetic usage?]

HDG.CCP.content: if only I possessed (hätte) already the right releasement (Gelassenheit) [can one possess releasement?], could wean from willing, freed of task of weaning
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: if only I possessed (hätte) already the right releasement (Gelassenheit) [can one possess releasement?], could wean from willing, freed of task of weaning

HDG.DL.content: language defines (bestimmt) the hermeneutic relation: go right on releasing (entlassen) into open whatever might be said (not a non-committal drifting away)

HDG.LP.content: [Heidegger discusses the relation btwn clarification (Erläuterung) of poem and discussion (Erörterung)] to discuss must pass through clarification, any right clarification [another version of authenticity] presupposes discussion: thinking dialogue (denkende Zwiesprache) w/ Gedicht remains (verharrt) w/in reciprocity (Wechselbezug) btwn clarification/discussion > only poetic dialogue w/ Gedicht is true dialogue: poetic conversation (Gespräch) btwn poets
HDG.LP.linkedContent: [Heidegger discusses the relation btwn clarification (Erläuterung) of poem and discussion (Erörterung)] to discuss must pass through clarification, any right clarification [another version of authenticity] presupposes discussion: thinking dialogue (denkende Zwiesprache) w/ Gedicht remains (verharrt) w/in reciprocity (Wechselbezug) btwn clarification/discussion > only poetic dialogue w/ Gedicht is true dialogue: poetic conversation (Gespräch) btwn poets

HDG.LP.content: since Plato, soul suprasensuous (Übersinnlichen), if it appears in sensible world, does so as a castaway (verschlagen) > on Earth, soul doesn’t have the right cast (rechten Schlag), doesn’t belong, is something strange (ein Fremdes) [body is soul’s prison]
HDG.LP.linkedContent: since Plato, soul suprasensuous (Übersinnlichen), if it appears in sensible world, does so as a castaway (verschlagen) > on Earth, soul doesn’t have the right cast (rechten Schlag), doesn’t belong, is something strange (ein Fremdes) [body is soul’s prison]

HDG.LP.content: in Trakl, blue not an image to mark holy [symbol?], blue is the depth of the holy—because of its gathering > frozen rigor (Starre) of animal face not that of dead [rigor mortis], gathers into silent gaze (Aussehen) toward holy
HDG.LP.linkedContent: in Trakl, blue not an image to mark holy [symbol?], blue is the depth of the holy—because of its gathering > frozen rigor (Starre) of animal face not that of dead [rigor mortis], gathers into silent gaze (Aussehen) toward holy

HDG.LP.content: indeterminacy of animal face in Trakl, not yet gathered into its essential being, the thinking animal, animal rationale, man
HDG.LP.linkedContent: indeterminacy of animal face in Trakl, not yet gathered into its essential being, the thinking animal, animal rationale, man

HDG.LP.content: the indeterminacy of man [via Trakl] means man is all too firmly confirmed as factum (Tatsache) [factical life], not yet been gathered/brought (gebracht) to firm ground (Feste), “home,” in das Einheimische ihres verhüllten Wesens > Western-European metaphysics may be struggling in vain, its way to the Unterwegs may be blocked: modern man is the animal not yet determined (fest-gestellte Tier) in its nature
HDG.LP.linkedContent: the indeterminacy of man [via Trakl] means man is all too firmly confirmed as factum (Tatsache) [factical life], not yet been gathered/brought (gebracht) to firm ground (Feste), “home,” in das Einheimische ihres verhüllten Wesens > Western-European metaphysics may be struggling in vain, its way to the Unterwegs may be blocked: modern man is the animal not yet determined (fest-gestellte Tier) in its nature

HDG.LP.content: gold, truth, rightness > [death] earliness in which stranger has expired (verstorben), shelters the Wesensgerechte of the unborn > the end (Ende) not sequel (Folge) of beginning, its the end of decaying Geschlechtes, thus precedes (vorauf) beginning of unborn Geschlechtes: as earlier earliness, has already overtaken the end
HDG.LP.linkedContent: gold, truth, rightness > [death] earliness in which stranger has expired (verstorben), shelters the Wesensgerechte of the unborn > the end (Ende) not sequel (Folge) of beginning, its the end of decaying Geschlechtes, thus precedes (vorauf) beginning of unborn Geschlechtes: as earlier earliness, has already overtaken the end

HDG.EC.content: in accustomed translation of mortality, it’s the relation to death, not to the immortals, that is named > only man, not animal, knows death, can go towards death > animal cannot die, cannot have death

motif.name: TRANSLATION / BABEL in TB (BENJAMIN'S "TASK OF THE TRANSLATOR")
motif.title: TRANSLATION / BABEL in TB (BENJAMIN'S "TASK OF THE TRANSLATOR")

HDG.EC.linkedContent: in accustomed translation of mortality, it’s the relation to death, not to the immortals, that is named > only man, not animal, knows death, can go towards death > animal cannot die, cannot have death

HDG.EC.content: those who wait learn right humble contentment (rechte Genügsamkeit), teachers of great poverty (Armut) > that which heals lets our essence wait: in waiting, human gathered in attentiveness to that which he belongs—can’t let himself get carried away (wegzuheben)/absorbed (aufzulösen) in it [danger of attention]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: those who wait learn right humble contentment (rechte Genügsamkeit), teachers of great poverty (Armut) > that which heals lets our essence wait: in waiting, human gathered in attentiveness to that which he belongs—can’t let himself get carried away (wegzuheben)/absorbed (aufzulösen) in it [danger of attention]

HDG.OHF.content: dialectic must sideline itself re: fundamental task (i.e. work out question of object & how to decide it) > dialectic can’t stay w/ object & allow object to prescribe (vorgeben) “right mode of grasping it and the limits to this”
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: dialectic must sideline itself re: fundamental task (i.e. work out question of object & how to decide it) > dialectic can’t stay w/ object & allow object to prescribe (vorgeben) “right mode of grasping it and the limits to this”

HDG.OHF.content: [method warning re: phenomenology] not about obtaining/delivering propositions/dogmas re: Dasein, generating a philosophy around it > rather, a special investigation w/ view to right direction of looking toward genuine phenomenon

HDG.OHF.content: [method] to hit upon object in primordial manner: 1) provide/sketch in advance character of being of object of philosophy 2) provide/sketch character of way it becomes object for us 3) right way to gain access to it & bring it to true safekeeping

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method] to hit upon object in primordial manner: 1) provide/sketch in advance character of being of object of philosophy 2) provide/sketch character of way it becomes object for us 3) right way to gain access to it & bring it to true safekeeping

HDG.OHF.content: (formal indication) forehaving of Dasein = being-there of Dasein (factical life) is being in a world > the success of such a demonstration (Ausweisung) doesn’t say anything primordial about forehaving, is only a phenomenon of another forehaving lying further back (already at work in our descriptions) [infinite regress of forehaving, no arrival?] [but Heidegger stresses this being in a world only a formal indication, we must follow its indefiniteness to the right path of looking (rechte Blickbahn), by way of intuition?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: (formal indication) forehaving of Dasein = being-there of Dasein (factical life) is being in a world > the success of such a demonstration (Ausweisung) doesn’t say anything primordial about forehaving, is only a phenomenon of another forehaving lying further back (already at work in our descriptions) [infinite regress of forehaving, no arrival?] [but Heidegger stresses this being in a world only a formal indication, we must follow its indefiniteness to the right path of looking (rechte Blickbahn), by way of intuition?]

HDG.OHF.content: only on basis (Grunde) of familiarity (Vertrautheit) [everydayness] can the “strange (Fremdes)” come forth > this lack of familiarity belongs to world being encountered, a heightened (gesteigertes) “there,” its inconvenience lies right w/in inexplicit (unabgehobenen) self-evidence of the familiarity of the there of everyday world > lack of familiarity belongs to world’s being-encountered, that’s why disturbed familiarity [contingent “otherwise than one thought”] has sense of being there > strange is there in its unpredictability/incalculability (Unberechenbarkeit)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: only on basis (Grunde) of familiarity (Vertrautheit) [everydayness] can the “strange (Fremdes)” come forth > this lack of familiarity belongs to world being encountered, a heightened (gesteigertes) “there,” its inconvenience lies right w/in inexplicit (unabgehobenen) self-evidence of the familiarity of the there of everyday world > lack of familiarity belongs to world’s being-encountered, that’s why disturbed familiarity [contingent “otherwise than one thought”] has sense of being there > strange is there in its unpredictability/incalculability (Unberechenbarkeit)
